titles.title: A bill to require that imports of fresh ginger root meet all the requirements imposed on domestic fresh ginger root.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1933 to subject imported fresh ginger root to the same restrictions as those applicable to domestic ginger.
